Posts.EditableText: As part of taking over Quest, I have been getting Quest source code to run on my PC, and it is not trivial. Getting it to run on Linux should be possible in theory, but you would need to get a version of .NET for Linux (it is Windows based, but there are versions out there). Then you have to workout how to get that working on a server (and some of the code is orientated specifically towards Azure). I would love to have Quest running on Linux (and Mac), so let us know how it goes and how you did it
